<![CDATA[Belfast Newsletter - News]]> Feed http://www.newsletter.co.uk/news Copyright 2016, Johnston Press Plc http://www.newsletter.co.uk/news/innl-news-feed-1-1571541 Fri, 13 May 2016 08:31:24 +0100 http://blogs.law.harvard.edu/tech/rss 60 <![CDATA[Sam McBride: UUP decision could benefit them – but also DUP and Sinn Fein]]> http://www.newsletter.co.uk/sam-mcbride-uup-decision-could-benefit-them-but-also-dup-and-sinn-fein-1-7380631

Mike Nesbitt was elected as a cautious leader by a party which baulked at John McCallister for several reasons, one of which was that he would immediately take the party into Opposition.

]]> 1.7380631 Fri, 13 May 2016 08:31:24 +0100 <![CDATA[IRA victim ‘stunned’ at second health referral to terror memorial centre]]> http://www.newsletter.co.uk/ira-victim-stunned-at-second-health-referral-to-terror-memorial-centre-1-7380226

An elderly IRA victim who was left traumatised in January after she unwittingly attended a health appointment in a community centre which hosts a large memorial wall to IRA terrorists, has been left “absolutely stunned” when she was invited back to the same location for another medical consultation.
